channel.title: Publications on Biology explorer
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Biology explorer

item.title: Integrative and perturbation based analysis of the transcriptional dynamics of TGFβ/BMP system components in transition from embryonic stem cells to neural progenitors.
item.description: Contribution: Design, generation, processing, analyzing and interpretation of all data. Discussing, writing and editing of paper.

item.title: BORIS promotes chromatin regulatory interactions in treatment-resistant cancer cells.
item.description: Contribution: Design, processing, analyzing and interpretation of scRNAseq, micro-array, ChIP-seq, HiChIP and public data. Discussing, writing and editing of paper.

item.title: Giotto, a pipeline for integrative analysis and visualization of single-cell spatial transcriptomic data.
item.description: Contribution: Design and build of Giotto Analyzer. Discussing, writing and editing of paper.

item.title: RESCUE: imputing dropout events in single- cell RNA-sequencing data.
item.description: Contribution: Methodology, writing and overview of project.

item.title: CDK12 loss in cancer cells affects DNA damage response genes through premature cleavage and polyadenylation.
item.description: Contribution: Design, processing, analyzing and interpretation of TT-seq and Poly(A)-seq data. Discussing, writing and editing of paper.

item.title: Transcriptome-scale super-resolved imaging in tissues by RNA seqFISH+
item.description: Contribution: Data analysis and interpretation. Writing and editing of manuscript.

item.title: Identification of spatially associated subpopulations by combining scrNAseq and sequential fluorescence in situ hybridization data.
item.description: Contribution: Processing of high-throughput datasets. Data analysis and interpretation. Writing and editing of manuscript.

item.title: NK cells mediate synergistic antitumor effects of combined inhibition of HDAC6 and BET in a SCLC preclinical model.
Genomic and functional fidelity of small cell lung cancer patient-derived xenografts.
Interleukin-17A Promotes Lung Tumor Progression through Neutrophil Attraction to Tumor Sites and Mediating Resistance to PD-1 Blockade.
Synergistic Immunostimulatory Effects and Therapeutic Benefit of Combined Histone Deacetylase and Bromodomain Inhibition in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer.
Zeb2 Regulates Cell Fate at the Exit from Epiblast State in Mouse Embryonic Stem Cells.
item.description: Contribution: Analysis of RNAseq, RRBS and HT-qPCR data. Writing and editing of manuscript.

item.title: Multiparametric profiling of non-small-cell lung cancers reveals distinct immunophenotypes.
BMP-SMAD Signaling Regulates Lineage Priming, but Is Dispensable for Self-Renewal in Mouse Embryonic Stem Cells.
item.description: Contribution: Analysis of RNAseq and RRBS data. Editing of manuscript. More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: CDK4/6 Inhibition Augments Anti-Tumor Immunity by Enhancing T Cell Activation.
item.description: More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: Directed migration of cortical interneurons depends on the cell-autonomous action of Sip1.
Few Smad proteins and many Smad-interacting proteins yield multiple functions and action modes in TGFβ/BMP signaling in vivo.
